title: Council Decision of 23 February 1998 appointing a member of the Advisory Committee on Education and Training in the field of Architecture
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 23 February 1998 appointing a member of the Advisory Committee on Education and Training in the field of Architecture (98/C 69/03)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body: Mrs M. J. C. FENNEMA is hereby appointed a member of the Advisory Committee on Education and Training in the field of Architecture in place of Mr Henk ZANDVOORT for the remainder of the latter's term of office, which ends on 25 February 1999.
attachments:
Done in Brussels, 23 February 1998.
For the Council
The President
R. COOK
(1) OJ L 223, 21.8.1985, p. 26.
(2) OJ C 74, 14.3.1996, p. 1.
